body.Title: Cotton T-Shirt
body.Verbose_Description: Our first product and still the most popular, the Cotton T-Shirt is the cornerstone of any man’s wardrobe. Made from the world’s highest quality cotton for extra softness and durability. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Short Sleeve T-Shirt, White, 150 g/m2 100% Supima Cotton

body.Title: Cotton T-Shirt / Long-Sleeve
body.Verbose_Description: The iconic Cotton T-Shirt but with a little extra coverage - great for layering but also well-suited to be worn on its own. Made from the world’s highest quality cotton for extra softness and durability. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Long Sleeve T-Shirt, White, 150 g/m2 100% Supima Cotton

body.Title: Wool T-Shirt
body.Verbose_Description: Our Wool T-Shirt has a subtle texture and sheen that bring life to the color and add an elegant note. Merino wool is naturally thermoregulating, keeping you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s cold - without being itchy. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Wool Short Sleeve T-Shirt, Asphalt, 135 g/m2 100% Superfine Merino Wool

body.Title: Pique Polo Shirt
body.Verbose_Description: There are few iconic pieces more effortlessly elegant than the classic Pique Polo Shirt. The characteristic honeycomb structure doesn’t only make for an interesting look, it also increases breathability as moisture can evaporate more easily. Made from the world’s highest quality cotton for a luxurious feel and drape. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Pique Short Sleeve Polo, Navy, 100% Supima Cotton. 170 g/m2

body.Title: Pique Polo Shirt / Long-Sleeve
body.Verbose_Description: There are few iconic pieces more effortlessly elegant than the classic Pique Polo Shirt - here with long sleeves for a little extra coverage. The characteristic honeycomb structure doesn’t only make for an interesting look, it also increases breathability as moisture can evaporate more easily. Made from the world’s highest quality cotton for a luxurious feel and drape. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Long Sleeve Pique Polo, Navy, 100% Supima Cotton. 170 g/m2

body.Title: Pique T-Shirt
body.Verbose_Description: Traditionally used for Polo Shirts, the pique fabric adds a refined twist to the classic T-Shirt. The characteristic honeycomb structure doesn’t only make for an interesting look, it also increases breathability as moisture can evaporate more easily. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Pique Short Sleeve T-Shirt, Navy, 100% Supima Cotton. 170 g/m2

body.Title: Cotton Sweatshirt
body.Description: Long Sleeve Sweatshirt, Black, 100% Supima Cotton Fleece

body.Title: Light Summer T-Shirt
body.Verbose_Description: Our lightest T-Shirt is made for sunny days: Thanks to the properties of TENCEL™ Lyocell, it has a light feel, is slightly cool to the touch, and naturally unfavorable for bacterial growth. TENCEL™ Lyocell is a cellulosic fiber, sourced from certified and controlled forests. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Light Summer Tee, Sunrise Blue, 130 g/m2 67% Micro Tencel™ 33% Cotton

body.Title: Cotton Hi-Neck T-Shirt
body.Verbose_Description: The accentuated neck and side slits add a contemporary twist to the classic T-Shirt. Made from the world’s highest quality cotton for extra softness and durability. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Short Sleeve High Neck T-Shirt, White, 200 g/m2 100% Supima Cotton

body.Title: Wool T-Shirt / Long-Sleeve
body.Verbose_Description: Everything we love about the Wool T-Shirt but with a little extra coverage. The subtle texture and sheen bring life to the color and add an elegant note. Merino wool is also naturally thermoregulating, keeping you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s cold - without being itchy. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Long Sleeve Wool T-Shirt, Asphalt, 135 g/m2 100% Superfine Merino Wool

body.Title: Pullover / Zero Waste
body.Verbose_Description: A wardrobe staple with thoughtful details like enhanced cuffs and neckline. Made from the extrafine, long fibers of Merino wool, it provides warmth without being bulky and feels soft on the skin. The first 3D-knitted, made-to-order Pullover in the world causes less than 1% production waste compared to an industry average of 20% for each clothing item produced. Made to Order in Italy.
body.Description: Zero Waste Pullover, Black, 2/48 1 ply 100% Extra Fine Merino Wool

body.Title: Pique Henley Shirt
body.Verbose_Description: Essentially a collarless Pique Polo Shirt but with a more casual look and feel that is entirely its own, the Pique Henley Shirt goes back to a British rowing team. The characteristic honeycomb structure doesn’t only make for an interesting look, it also increases breathability as moisture can evaporate more easily. Made from the world’s highest quality cotton for a luxurious feel and drape. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Pique Henley Short Sleeve, Navy, 100% Supima Cotton. 170 g/m2

body.Title: Wool Hi-Neck T-Shirt
body.Verbose_Description: The accentuated neck and side slits give a contemporary twist to the classic T-Shirt. The Merino wool adds a subtle texture and sheen that bring the color to life. Thanks to the thermoregulating properties of wool, this T-Shirt keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s cold - without being itchy. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Short Sleeve High Neck Wool T-Shirt, Asphalt, 135 g/m2 100% Superfine Merino Wool

body.Title: Pique Henley Shirt / Long-Sleeve
body.Verbose_Description: Essentially a collarless Pique Polo but with a more casual look and feel that is entirely its own, the Pique Henley goes back to a British rowing team. The characteristic honeycomb structure doesn’t only make for an interesting look, it also increases breathability as moisture can evaporate more easily. Made from the world’s highest quality cotton for a luxurious feel and drape. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Pique Henley Long Sleeve, Navy, 100% Supima Cotton. 170 g/m2

body.Title: Tencel T-Shirt
body.Verbose_Description: The silhouette of the classic T-Shirt with a subtle surface luster that accentuates the color. TENCEL™ Lyocell offers silklike softness that is slightly cool to the touch and is naturally unfavorable for bacterial growth, making it an ideal choice on hot days. TENCEL™ Lyocell is a cellulosic fiber, sourced from certified and controlled forests. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Tencel T-Shirt, Ballad Blue, 170 g/m2 67% Micro Tencel™ 33% Cotton

body.Title: Hi-Neck Pullover / Zero Waste
body.Verbose_Description: The accentuated neckline adds a contemporary twist to the classic Pullover. Made from the extrafine, long fibers of Merino wool, it provides warmth without being bulky and feels soft on the skin. The first 3D-knitted, made-to-order Pullover in the world causes less than 1% production waste compared to an industry average of 20% for each clothing item produced. Made to Order in Italy.
body.Description: Zero Waste Hi-Neck, Black, 2/48 1 ply 100% Extra Fine Merino Wool

body.Title: Turtle-Neck Pullover / Zero Waste
body.Verbose_Description: The classic double-folded neckline provides extra coverage and a distinct look that's sophisticated yet laid back. Made from the extrafine, long fibers of Merino wool, the Turtle-Neck Pullover provides warmth without being bulky and feels soft on the skin. The first 3D-knitted, made-to-order Pullover in the world causes less than 1% production waste compared to an industry average of 20% for each clothing item produced. Made to Order in Italy.
body.Description: Zero Waste Turtle-Neck, Black, 2/48 1 ply 100% Extra Fine Merino Wool

body.Title: Wool Hi-Neck T-Shirt / Long-Sleeve
body.Verbose_Description: The accentuated neck and side slits give a contemporary twist to the classic T-Shirt, the long sleeves add a little extra coverage. The Merino wool makes for a subtle texture and sheen that bring the color to life. It's also naturally thermoregulating, keeping you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s cold - without being itchy. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Long Sleeve High Neck Wool T-Shirt, Asphalt, 135 g/m2 100% Superfine Merino Wool

body.Title: Cotton Hi-Neck / Long-Sleeve
body.Verbose_Description: The accentuated neck and side slits give a contemporary twist to the classic T-Shirt, the long sleeves add a little extra coverage. Made from the world’s highest quality cotton for extra softness and durability. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Long Sleeve High Neck T-Shirt, White, 200 g/m2 100% Supima Cotton

body.Title: Heavy Wool Sweater / Zero Waste
body.Verbose_Description: The Wool Sweater is slightly on the thicker side and has a characteristic structure. Knitted in one whole piece from extrafine Merino wool, it flexibly follows movement and feels soft on the skin. The first 3D-knitted, made-to-order Pullover in the world causes less than 1% production waste compared to an industry average of 20% for each clothing item produced. Made to Order in Italy.
body.Description: Zero Waste Sweater, Black, 2/30 4 ply 100% Extra Fine Merino Wool

body.Title: Pique Shirt
body.Verbose_Description: The Pique Shirt combines the comfort and breathability of the Pique Polo with the classic silhouette of a Shirt. The characteristic honeycomb structure doesn’t only make for an interesting look, it also increases breathability as moisture can evaporate more easily. Made from the world’s highest quality cotton for a luxurious feel and drape. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Pique Shirt, Navy, 100% Supima Cotton. 170 g/m2

body.Title: Active T-Shirt
body.Verbose_Description: Our Active T-Shirt is constructed to keep you cool and comfortable while working out - from weight lifting to team sports to running. The combination of Merino wool and TENCEL™ Lyocell makes for extra breathability and a waffle effect on the inside increases air circulation, giving a lighter feel no matter how hard the workout. The Active T-Shirt features reflective details on front and back. Made to Order in Portugal.

Black.material: 145 g/m2 52% Micro Tencel™ 26% Recycled Polyester 22% Merino Wool

Navy.material: 145 g/m2 52% Micro Tencel™ 26% Recycled Polyester 22% Merino Wool

Iron.material: 145 g/m2 52% Micro Tencel™ 26% Recycled Polyester 22% Merino Wool

body.Description: Short Sleeve Active T-Shirt, Black, 145 g/m2 52% Micro Tencel™ 26% Recycled Polyester 22% Merino Wool

body.Title: Active T-Shirt / Long-Sleeve
body.Verbose_Description: Our Active T-Shirt is constructed to keep you cool and comfortable while working out - from weight lifting to team sports to running. The combination of Merino wool and TENCEL™ Lyocell makes for extra breathability and a waffle effect on the inside increases air circulation, giving a lighter feel no matter how hard the workout. The Active T-Shirt features reflective details on front and back. Made to Order in Portugal.

Black.material: 145 g/m2 52% Micro Tencel™ 26% Recycled Polyester 22% Merino Wool

Navy.material: 145 g/m2 52% Micro Tencel™ 26% Recycled Polyester 22% Merino Wool

Iron.material: 145 g/m2 52% Micro Tencel™ 26% Recycled Polyester 22% Merino Wool

body.Description: Long Sleeve Active T-Shirt, Black, 145 g/m2 52% Micro Tencel™ 26% Recycled Polyester 22% Merino Wool

body.Title: Oxford Shirt
body.Verbose_Description: An everyday essential for any occasion: Featuring a classic button-down collar and a back pleat for freedom of movement. Made from 100% cotton in the traditional Oxford cloth, it is thick enough to be worn on its own yet thin enough to slip under a blazer. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Oxford Shirt, White, 150 g/m2 100% Organic Cotton

body.Title: Cardigan / Zero Waste
body.Verbose_Description: The Cardigan features the same beautiful texture as our Heavy Wool Sweater. Knitted in one whole piece, it remains wonderfully flexible while providing the warmth and cozy feel of heavier knitwear. The minimal design without pockets makes it the ideal layering piece. As for all our knitwear, we utilize 3D-knitting technology to make the Cardigan, resulting in less than 1% production waste compared to an industry average of 20% for each clothing item produced. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: ZWC Cardigan, Gobi, 2/30 4 ply 100% Extra Fine Merino Wool

body.Title: Tencel Undershirt
body.Verbose_Description: We reengineered the Undershirt to be invisible in color and in touch. The range of shades is designed to match your skin tone so the Undershirt becomes invisible under your Shirt. Thanks to the properties of TENCEL™ Lyocell, the fabric is naturally unfavorable for bacterial growth and feels feather light on the skin, making you feel fresh for longer. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Invisible Undershirt, White, 150 g/m2 100% Tencel™

body.Title: Cotton Hoodie
body.Verbose_Description: We refined the Cotton Hoodie to be worn from work to weekend. Powder-coated tone-in-tone trimmings and no pocket make for a minimal look. In the sweet spot between medium- and heavy-weight, it is thick enough to be worn on its own yet thin enough for layering. The loopback structure on the inside retains the body temperature without adding extra bulk. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Long Sleeve Hoodie, Black, 100% Supima Cotton Fleece

body.Title: Cotton Pocket T-Shirt
body.Verbose_Description: Our first product and still the most popular, the Cotton T-Shirt is the cornerstone of any man’s wardrobe. Made from the world’s highest quality cotton for extra softness and durability. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Pocket T-Shirt, White, 200 g/m2 100% Supima Cotton

body.Title: SON T-Shirt
body.Description: SON T-Shirt, White, 200 g/m2 100% Supima Cotton

body.Title: Waffle T-Shirt
body.Verbose_Description: The Waffle T-Shirt bridges relaxed and refined in the most comfortable way. The unique waffle texture enhances air circulation, lets it dry fast, and gives it its characteristic 4-way stretch. Featuring small side slits for freedom of movement. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Waffle Short Sleeve T-Shirt, Coffee Bean, 200 g/m2 100% Organic Cotton

body.Title: Half-Zip Sweatshirt
body.Verbose_Description: A re-interpretation of the classic Sweatshirt, the Half-Zip Sweatshirt is the perfect layering piece: the accentuated neck and subtle zipper let you seamlessly transition between a more athletic and casual look. In the sweet spot between medium- and heavy-weight, the Sweatshirt provides warmth without adding too much bulk. Made to Order in Portugal.
body.Description: Half-Zip Sweatshirt, Deep Blue, 100% Supima Cotton Fleece
